description: The current status of the ReplicationController.

availableReplicas.description: The number of available replicas (ready for at least `minReadySeconds`) for this ReplicationController.

conditions.description: The latest observations of a ReplicationController's current state.

fullyLabeledReplicas.description: The number of Pods that have labels matching the `labels` of the Pod `template` of the ReplicationController.

observedGeneration.description: The generation of the most recently observed ReplicationController.

readyReplicas.description: The number of ready replicas for this ReplicationController.

replicas.description: The most recently oberved number of replicas.
